TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DatapointSourceAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.NUnitAttribute

Docs.summary: Used to mark a field, property or method providing a set of datapoints to be used in executing any theories within the same fixture that require an argument of the Type provided. The data source may provide an array of the required Type or an IEnumerable<T>. Synonymous with DatapointsAttribute.
